articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets climb as investors assess a possible thaw in U.S.-China trade war - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets rose Friday after Wall Street saw its third straight day of gains as tech stocks rallied.
articles.content: Asia markets rose after Wall Street gained for a third straight day as tech stocks rallied, with investors assessing the trade climate as the U.S. tones down tariff rhetoric and China reportedly mull… [+1626 chars]
